short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly copy configured text to clipboard with two clicks. Sync configured text across devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You may have long user IDs, emails, account numbers, etc which you need to type everyday. Quick Copy extension allows you to configure such text and easily copy right from your browser with two clicks. 

How to use:
----------------
- Input text and optionally select background color and click Add. Now that text is available to be copied anytime. 
- To copy just click on one of the configured text and it will be copied automatically. 

Features:
-----------------
- Quickly copy configured text to clipboard. 
- Background color to group or quickly identify words to be copied. Very helpful during busy day.
- Syncs the configured data across devices. (This requires you to enable Sync functionality in your browser)

Permissions:
-----------------
This extension does not have access to webpage or any content. It does not transmit any data. The ONLY permission needed is "storage" which is used for storing your configured text. 

Source code:
-----------------
Source code is available for review and contribution on Github
https://github.com/somared/QuickCopyChromeExt
